# Minimalistic personal blog

Tech stack:

- Next.js
- Tailwind
- MDX
- Front Matter

## Scripts

- `npm run dev`

---

- `npm run start`

- `npm run build`

- `npm run lint`

## Helpers & packages

- [tailwind-styled-components](https://www.npmjs.com/package/tailwind-styled-components)
- Inspired by [tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog](https://github.com/timlrx/tailwind-nextjs-starter-blog)

## Automatization

- You can generate color shades by using `command palette â†’ Generate custom color palette`
